definition: African Union (AU), abbr. for 非洲聯盟|非洲联盟
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: The AU says it would not administer the carbon cash directly.
sentences.chinese: 非盟表示不會直接負責管理這筆碳排放補償費。

sentences.english: The AU says the panel's decisions will be legally binding.
sentences.chinese: 非盟說，這個小組的決定將具有法律約束力。

sentences.english: However, the EU and the AU are offering help to applicants, he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說，然而歐盟和非盟正提出要幫助申請者。

sentences.english: Yet the United States should have expected AU pushback.
sentences.chinese: 然而，美國應該已經預料到了非盟的挫敗。

sentences.english: Read more about the AU summit in SciDev.Net's dedicated news focus.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀本網站關於非盟峯會的新聞聚焦。

sentences.english: But the AU has no way to enforce those decisions.
sentences.chinese: 但是非盟沒有使這些決定得以實施的手段。

sentences.english: Back then, however, the AU did not exist.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在那時候，非盟還不存在。

sentences.english: The AU has done distinctly better than the OAU.
sentences.chinese: 非盟明顯比以前的非統表現地更好。

sentences.english: Mr. Odinga has called for the deployment of international peacekeepers from the African Union or United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 奧廷加呼籲非盟或聯合國部屬國際維和人員。

pinyin: Yi1 si1 lan2 Hui4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: António Guterres (1949-), secretary-general of the United Nations (2017-), prime minister of Portugal (1995-2002)
Arab League, regional organization of Arab states in Southwest Asia, and North and Northeast Africa, officially called the League of Arab States
pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Guo2 jia1 Lian2 meng2

definition: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE), abbr. for 歐洲安全與合作組織|欧洲安全与合作组织[Ou1 zhou1 An1 quan2 yu3 He2 zuo4 Zu3 zhi1]

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 He2 zuo4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia

pinyin: Mei3 zhou1 Guo2 jia1 Zu3 zhi1
Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1
